name: @neurolint/cli
description: NeuroLint Pro CLI - Advanced React/Next.js code fixing and analysis tool

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc src/cli-production.ts src/commands/analyze-fixed.ts src/commands/fix-fixed.ts src/commands/init.ts src/commands/config.ts src/commands/status.ts src/commands/login.ts src/utils/config.ts src/types.ts --outDir release --target ES2020 --module CommonJS --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --moduleResolution node --declaration
scripts.test:all: npm run dev -- help && npm run dev -- init --force && npm run dev -- status

author: NeuroLint
